faqs.question: How often should I service my AC unit?
faqs.answer: For optimal performance, we recommend servicing your AC unit at least twice a year - before summer and winter. However, if you use your AC extensively or have an older unit, more frequent maintenance may be beneficial.

faqs.question: What's included in a standard AC maintenance service?
faqs.answer: Our standard AC maintenance includes cleaning or replacing filters, checking refrigerant levels, inspecting electrical components and connections, cleaning evaporator and condenser coils, checking thermostat operation, and testing overall system performance.

faqs.question: How long does an AC maintenance service take?
faqs.answer: A standard AC maintenance service typically takes 1-2 hours per unit, depending on the type, size, and condition of your AC system.

faqs.question: Can AC maintenance help reduce my electricity bill?
faqs.answer: Yes, regular AC maintenance can significantly reduce your electricity bills. A well-maintained AC unit operates more efficiently, consuming less power while providing optimal cooling.

faqs.question: Do you provide maintenance for all types of AC units?
faqs.answer: Yes, our technicians are trained to service all types of AC units including split systems, window units, central air conditioning, and ducted systems from all major brands.
